subject: Newtown, Conn, Shooting (2012)
Football
lead_paragraph: Victor Cruz visited Newtown, Conn., and gave his cleats and gloves to the family of Jack Pinto, 6, who was buried in a Cruz replica jersey.
snippet: Victor Cruz visited Newtown, Conn., and gave his cleats and gloves to the family of Jack Pinto, 6, who was buried in a Cruz replica jersey.
